en: We give thanks unto thee, O God; We give thanks, for thy name is near: Men tell of thy wondrous works.
hmr: Aw Pathien, lâwmthu kan hril che, Lâwmthu kan hril che, i hming a hnai sih a; Mihaiin i thilmakthaw thuhai chu an hril hlak.

en: When I shall find the set time, I will judge uprightly.
hmr: Hun ruot chu ka hmu pha chun, Indiktakin ro rêl ka tih.

en: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I have set up the pillars of it. [Selah
hmr: Hnuoi le a chunga um po pohai chu an intuihmang zo tah: Keiin a banhai chu ka phun a nih.

en: I said unto the arrogant, Deal not arrogantly; And to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
hmr: Mi uonghai kuoma chun, “Iengleangin um naw ro,” ka tih a, Mi rilohai kuomah, “In ki suk- sâng naw ro,” ka ti bawk a.

en: Lift not up your horn on high; Speak not with a stiff neck.
hmr: In ki chu chungtieng suksâng naw unla, Rîng tlûn pumin ṭawng naw ro.

en: For neither from the east, nor from the west, Nor yet from the south, cometh lifting up.
hmr: Suksângna chu saktienga inthawk a ni nawh, thlangtienga inthawk a ni bawk nawh. Simtienga inthawk hlak a ni bawk nawh.

en: But God is the judge: He putteth down one, and lifteth up another.
hmr: Pathien chu rorêltu a ni lem: Ama chun pakhat a suktlâwm a, pakhat a suksâng hlak.

en: For in the hand of Jehovah there is a cup, and the wine foameth; It is full of mixture, and he poureth out of the same: Surely the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall drain them, and drink them.
hmr: LALPA kuta chun no a um sih a, a uoin chu a phul a, Thil dang le chawkpawlin a sip a, chutaka inthawk chu a bunsuok a. Matheiloin a nenghai chen chun hnuoia mi rilohai chun dâwn fai rêt an tih.

en: But I will declare for ever, I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chun chu kumkhuoin inhriettir ka ta, Jakob Pathien chu inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; But the horns of the righteous shall be lifted up.
hmr: Mi rilohai ki po po khawm chu tanpêk ka ta, Mi felhai ki ruok chu suksângin um a tih.
